page.title: 01SUMMARY
page.content: Our area encompasses a large part of {Sheffield City Centre}and its northern suburbs of{Hillsborough, Walkley, {Crookes and Pitsmoor.}It is mainly a residential area, with a variety of housing from old terraces to modern high-rise flats, much being built on Sheffield's many hills. There is some industry in the area, including large engineering firms (though many have now closed down) and various smaller new businesses. The people of the area tend to have lived there a long time. They have relatively cheap housing,good shopping areas (locally and centrally) and easy travelling to the City Centre, as Sheffield supports a cheap bus fare policy. Shoppers are attracted to the City Centre by modern shopping areas, many pedestrianised, and good indoor and outdoor markets.
